subject: PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: The winner of three titles in major golf events returns to the P.G.A. tournament to pick up a service award for his charities and to once again play "against the best players in the world."
snippet: The winner of three titles in major golf events returns to the P.G.A. tournament to pick up a service award for his charities and to once again play "against the best players in the world."
